attributes.action: A Censure paliamentry debate on the PM's cowardice in not participating in the Iraq War debate on 24th January 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I understand that the Foreign Secretary will lead the debate instead of The PM. As this war was HIS decision based on flawed information he should at least put up a personal defence of his recommendation to go to war and face questions fro all MP's.
